comment: Super nice lady but veryyy lecture heavy with a TON of homework. Don't take if you have other classes that take a lot of time. She's really sweet and understanding but the amount of work she makes you do is ridiculous. Easy A though as long as you do the work.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Caring

comment: Amount of work given is not on-par with the level of the class. In four years of college I've never had any class with so many assignments. These are overly time-consuming and there's just too many each week. Don't take her if you're a full-time student because there's just not time for her and other classes.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: No tests. Allows you to make up missed work. Allowed us to do some of the assignments together as a class (either as a verbal discussion or via the Discussion board on d2l) instead of actually writing out the assignment. Explains well and extends deadlines for class, if needed.
flat out awesome, i hate english and she was great
Easy class and easy grader as long as you do the work. Allows you to make up and re-do assignments if needed. Works hard to make the class interesting and tells a lot of stories.

She rocks!! As long as you keep up with your work and are nice to her. She is awesome and super helpful make sure to turn your work in when she says so though otherwise you fall behind very quickly. If you let her know you are there to be serious with your writing she will grade you accordingly.
Professor Race is Incredible. She is friendly, she is helpful, and she is always there for you. If you need anything, ask her. I would Highly Recommend.
Amazing English teacher. I hate English, and this professor made me enjoy taking this class. Very helpful, very easy to understand.

Great teacher. Actually there for the students, not just for a check. She understands that you are learning and allows for essay reviews. High energy and great communication. One of the best I have had.

Absolutely wonderful teacher! She is  very understanding and is open to assignment suggestions. This is because she likes her students to write for themselves and what interests them. Get her if you can!!

Very unorganized, but was very nice & by far the easiest teacher here. She grades easy & all we did was watch movies or listen to her ramble about the unit topic for an hour. While she does assign a decent amount of work; you will have plenty of time to work on them, as due dates are nothing more than suggestions, as they ALWAYS get pushed back.
Absolutely a great teacher. I would recommend to anyone. The papers are easy with more than enough time to write. Take this prof if you want a great teacher.
GREAT TEACHER. Very funny, grades easy. If you don't pass this class then you didn't bother attending this EASY class.
The absolute BEST professor to take for TCOM. Attendance is not required but her lectures are so interesting, that you'd want to be there. She assigns interesting work and grades it promptly.
Outstanding teacher! Get her class if you can!
Great Prof. she is very helpful and grades pretty easy.
She's a very good teacher, I wouldn't hesitate to take her again!
She is awesome! Show up to class and act like you care and she loves you! A few papers here and there but you put them all together and you have your final paper. She is great!
She is a really helpful teacher. Shows up to classes. However, makes you write at least 1 paper every other week. Grades easily and fairly.

AWESOME. She really lets you get creative and she makes the entire class fun. Sometimes we even get carried away with time bc discussions are so interesting. Very understanding with late work, she will help you get an A.
good teacher. cares about her subject and her students. enjoys creative writing and improved mine a whole lot!
